mapper.select: select count(*) from WISHLIST where member_useremail=#{member_useremail} and room_id=#{room_id}
mapper.delete: delete from WISHLIST where member_useremail=#{member_useremail} and room_id=#{room_id}
mapper.select: select i.image_photo,r.room_name,r.room_region,r.room_min_capacity,r.room_max_capacity,r.room_price,w.wishlist_date,w.room_id from WISHLIST w join ROOMS r on w.room_id = r.room_id left join( SELECT room_id, MIN(image_photo) AS image_photo FROM IMAGES GROUP BY room_id )as i on r.room_id = i.room_id where w.member_useremail = #{member_useremail} ORDER BY DATE(w.wishlist_date) DESC, r.room_id;
